snippet: Just because Serena Williams prefers to bludgeon her opponents with a mighty serve, that doesn’t make Agnieszka Radwanska’s craftiness and consistency any less effective.
abstract: Serena Williams defeats Victoria Azarenka to advance to the Wimbledon women's final; Agnieszka Radwanska defeats Angelique Kerber to advance; Williams is seeking her 14th Grand Slam championship, while Radwanska tries for her first.
lead_paragraph: Just because Serena Williams prefers to bludgeon her opponents with a mighty serve, that doesn’t make Agnieszka Radwanska’s craftiness and consistency any less effective.

headline.seo: Wimbledon — With Williams and Radwanska, a Final of Power vs. Precision
headline.main: In Women’s Final, Power vs. Precision
headline.print_headline: In Women’s Final, Power vs. Precision
